title: Pavilion - 50th Birthday - 6" Angel Holding 50th Heart
features: PREMIUM QUALITY: 6" angel figurine, packaged in a printed box, is made from polyresin.

IN-HOUSE DESIGN: "Happy 50th Birthday; May Today And All Of Your Tomorrows Be Filled With Joy And Love" text is debossed and painted onto the front of the angel, alongside an intricate silver design and heart.
PERFECT FOR GIFTING: Perfect for those celebrating their 50th birthday.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Dust with a dry cloth.
MORE PRODUCTS: Angels, in a similar style, are also available.
description: Elements angels by Pavilion gift is a gorgeous and unique line of angels and home accessories, each adorned with birchwood accents and pewter detailing. Branded with inspiration and sentiment, elements angels is the perfect gift that will bring beauty to your home. The new soft color palette and wing design have brought simplicity and classic beauty to the elements angels line. The wide selection of beautiful angels, ornaments, and water globes are sure to bring joy to your family and friends.
